BasicATK.Name: Frigid Cold Arrow
BasicATK.EffectRaw: Deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of March 7th's ATK to a single enemy.
BasicATK.AbridgedEffect: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single enemy.

Skill.Name: The Power of Cuteness
Skill.EffectRaw:
Provides a single ally with a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of March 7th's DEF plus <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak></color> for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
If the ally's current HP percentage is <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> or higher, greatly increases the chance of enemies attacking that ally.
Skill.AbridgedEffect: Provides a single ally with a Shield.

Ultimate.Name: Glacial Cascade
Ultimate.EffectRaw:
Deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of March 7th's ATK to all enemies. Hit enemies have a <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> to be Frozen for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
While Frozen, enemies cannot take action and will receive <u>Additional</u> Ice DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color> of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.
Ultimate.AbridgedEffect: Deals Ice DMG to all enemies, with a chance of Freezing them.

Talent.Name: Girl Power
Talent.EffectRaw: After a Shielded ally is attacked by an enemy, March 7th immediately <u>Counters</u>, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of her ATK. This effect can be triggered <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> time(s) each turn.

Technique.Name: Freezing Beauty
Technique.EffectRaw:
Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, there is a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> to Freeze a random enemy for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
While Frozen, the enemy cannot take action and will take <u>Additional</u> Ice DMG equal to <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy.
On a CRIT Hit, there is a <unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> to reduce the target's SPD by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

Ultimate.AbridgedEffect: Deals massive Wind DMG to a single enemy. If the enemy is Slowed, DMG multiplier dealt will be increased.

Talent.Name: Superiority of Reach
Talent.EffectRaw: When Dan Heng is the target of an ally's Ability, his next attack's Wind <u>RES PEN</u> increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. This effect can be triggered again after <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

Technique.Name: Splitting Spearhead
Technique.EffectRaw: After Dan Heng uses his Technique, his ATK increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> at the start of the next battle for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

If Himeko is fully Charged when an ally performs an attack, Himeko immediately performs 1 <u>follow-up attack</u> and deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of her ATK to all enemies, consuming all Charge points.
At the start of the battle, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge.

Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

Ultimate.Name: Synthetic Black Hole

Technique.Name: Gravitational Imprisonment

After using Welt's Technique, create a dimension that lasts for <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> second(s). Enemies in this dimension have their Movement SPD reduced by <unbreak>#5[i]%</unbreak>. Imprisoned enemies have their <u>actions delayed</u> by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> and SPD reduced by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>. Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

Talent.EffectRaw:
After an ally with Invigoration is hit, restores the ally's HP for <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[f1]%</unbreak></color> of Bailu's Max HP plus <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak></color>. This effect can trigger <unbreak>#5[i]</unbreak> time(s).
When an ally receives a killing blow, they will not be <u>knocked down</u>. Bailu immediately heals the ally for <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color> of Bailu's Max HP plus <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak></color> HP. This effect can be triggered 1 time per battle.

Technique.Name: Saunter in the Rain
Technique.EffectRaw: After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies are granted Invigoration for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

BasicATK.Name: Farewell Hit
BasicATK.EffectRaw: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.
BasicATK.AbridgedEffect: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single enemy.

EnhancedBasicATK.Name: Blowout: Farewell Hit
EnhancedBasicATK.EffectRaw: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.
EnhancedBasicATK.AbridgedEffect: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single enemy.

Skill.Name: RIP Home Run
Skill.EffectRaw: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.
Skill.AbridgedEffect: Deals Physical DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.

EnhancedSkill.Name: Blowout: RIP Home Run
EnhancedSkill.EffectRaw: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
EnhancedSkill.AbridgedEffect: Deals Physical DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.

Ultimate.Name: Stardust Ace
Ultimate.EffectRaw:
Choose between two attack modes to deliver a full strike.
Blowout: Farewell Hit deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.
Blowout: RIP Home Run deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy, and Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color> of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
Ultimate.AbridgedEffect: Uses Single Target ATK or Blast to strike with full force.

Talent.Name: Perfect Pickoff
Talent.EffectRaw: Each time after this character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, ATK increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. This effect stacks up to <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> time(s).

Technique.Name: Immortal Third Strike
Technique.EffectRaw: Immediately heals all allies for <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of their respective Max HP after using this Technique.

BasicATK.Name: Ice-Breaking Light
BasicATK.EffectRaw: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and gains 1 stack of Magma Will.
BasicATK.AbridgedEffect: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single enemy and gains Magma Will.

EnhancedBasicATK.Name: Ice-Breaking Light
EnhancedBasicATK.EffectRaw: Consumes 4 stacks of Magma Will to enhance Basic ATK, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG to equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
EnhancedBasicATK.AbridgedEffect: Consumes Magma Will, then deals Fire DMG to a single enemy and minor Fire DMG to enemies adjacent to it.

Skill.Name: Ever-Burning Amber
Skill.EffectRaw: Increases the Trailblazer's DMG Reduction by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> and gains 1 stack of Magma Will, with a <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> to Taunt all enemies for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
Skill.AbridgedEffect: Reduces DMG taken and gains Magma Will, with a high chance to Taunt all enemies.

Ultimate.Name: War-Flaming Lance
Ultimate.EffectRaw: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the Trailblazer's ATK plus <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of the Trailblazer's DEF to all enemies. The next Basic ATK will be automatically enhanced and does not cost Magma Will.
Ultimate.AbridgedEffect: Deals Fire DMG to all enemies and enhances the next Basic ATK.

Talent.Name: Treasure of the Architects
Talent.EffectRaw:
Each time the Trailblazer is hit, they gain 1 stack of Magma Will for a max of <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> stack(s).
When Magma Will has no fewer than 4 stacks, the Trailblazer's Basic ATK becomes enhanced, dealing DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.
When the Trailblazer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, apply a Shield to all allies that absorbs DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[f1]%</unbreak></color> of the Trailblazer's DEF plus <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak></color>. The Shield lasts for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
